description: Try our easy to follow Sharwood's Chicken Tikka Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken wrap,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Egg free,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Chicken,Spinach
name: Sharwood's Chicken Tikka Wraps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the natural yogurt, Sharwood’s tikka paste, lime juice and add to the chicken breast to marinade and mix well. Cover and place in the fridge for a couple of hours or overnight if possible.
Barbeque or griddle the chicken until cooked through (approx. 5-6 minutes on each side).
Slice the chicken after allowing it to rest for a few minutes and serve with tortilla wraps, onion, pepper, spinach and coriander.
Why not try adding a dollop of mango chutney in the wrap.
